RecordOperationSpec.Name: UMHS Set Match Review Status To Review Record Operation
RecordOperationSpec.Description: Update that review status to Review on the match set record
RecordOperationSpec.Author: UM Dev
RecordOperationSpec.RecordType: Matched MIMED Friend Contacts to U-M affiliations

SPOperationImplementation.c:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_UM_USP_RECORDOPERATION_UMHSSETMATCHREVIEWSTATUSTOREVIEW ( @ID uniqueidentifier, @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier ) as begin if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
update USR_UMHS_MATCHEDMIMEDCONTACTSTOUMAFFILIATIONS set REVIEWSTATUSCODE=0, CHANGEDBYID=@CHANGEAGENTID, DATECHANGED=@CURRENTDATE where ID=@ID
return 0;
end
